title: T206 HOF backs line for sale

posts.post_title: T206 HOF backs line for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: B O'Brien
28 card backs line for sale as a group, not interesting in breaking up at this time.  HOFers, Chase, Merkle and Shag (my personal favorites) make up the group.  
Take a look at the 20 card common lot, in lower grade, in REA last year that sold for $9900ish last spring for a price comparison.

If I have any takers, I want to start on the set, if not no worries, I will just build this lot as far as I can afford.

They are all yours for $17,500 Next Day, insured delivery.

American Beauty 350 with frame Roger Bresnahan (WB) SGC 50

Broad Leaf 350 J. Evers (CHI on shirt) SGC 50

Carolina Brights Chance (Yellow) SGC 30

Cycle 460 Joe Tinker (Bat on) SGC 50

Drum Vic Willis (Batting) SGC A

EPDG Walter Johnson (Port) SGC 40

Hindu Brown Christy Mathewson (Port.) SGC 20

Hindu Red Hugh Duffy PSA 2

Lenox Walter Johnson (HAC) SGC 40

Old Mill Hal Chase (Blue Port) SGC 40

Old Mill Southern Shag Shaughnessey SGC 50

Piedmont 350-460 (Fact. 42) Cy Young (Glove) SGC 20

Piedmont 350-460 (Fact. 25) Bender (No Trees) SGC 40

Piedmont 350 Keeler (Bat) SGC 40

Piedmont 150 Marquard (Hands at Side) PSA 3

Polar Bear Tris SpeakerSGC 40

Sovereign (460)Hal Chase (Trophy) PSA 4

Sovereign (350) Ed Walsh PSA 4

Sovereign (150) Rube Waddell (Throwing) SGC 40

Sweet Cap 350-460 (42,4) John McGraw (Glove) SGC 40

Sweet Cap 350-460 (30,2) Zack Wheat PSA 3

Sweet Cap 350-460 (42,4 overstrkie) Mathewson Dark Cap PSA 3

Sweet Cap 350 (30,2) Hal Chase (White) SGC 40

Sweet Cap 150 (25,2) Hal Chase (Pink) SGC 40

Sweet Cap 150 (649, 1 overstrike) Nap Lajoie PSA 3

Sweet Cap 150 (30,2) Cy Young (Port.) PSA 3

TolstoiTy Cobb (Red Port) SGC 40

Uzit Fred Merkle (Throwing) SGC 40

Thanks,
Bob
